legacy.full_text: What's wrong with "state media"? What's wrong with Chinese-style democracy? If the system delivers, it must have merits. result.text: This afternoon, I was invited to visit Renmin University of China in Beijing and share my 20-plus year journey in international communication with young university students. I can feel their passion and creativity to narrate multi-dimensional and objective Chinese stories to the world, which makes me walk away feeling more rejuvenated and inspired!

legacy.full_text: RT @FIDE_chess: "Chess belongs to the family of mind sports, that have a special place in the Olympic family. Currently, the International…

legacy.description: Official account of the International Chess Federation (FIDE)
legacy.name: International Chess Federation

result.text:
"Chess belongs to the family of mind sports, that have a special place in the Olympic family. Currently, the International Olympic Committee doesn't foresee chess being included in the 2024 and 2028 Olympic games. But the development that we saw during the last few years with FIDE's active participation gives us real hope that we will be able to include chess in the Continental Games - Asian Games is one such example. Chess was an exhibition sport in the European Games and the African Games. It is part of the official program in the Central American and Caribbean Games this year. It is a very good development. I hope that, at some point, a chess player will become an Olympic champion." - Arkady Dvorkovich talks to China Global Television Network @CGTNOfficial about chess in the Asian Games (@19thAGofficial). 

Watch the interview 👇 🔗 https://t.co/ZiE1TOisuq
